entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rainshower, 6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Hardy Airport 1:00 PM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023

Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 82 %
Dewpoint: 3.4°C

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers early this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. 40 percent chance of wet flurries inland overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. 30 percent chance of wet flurries inland early in the morning. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h over exposed coastal sections in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023
